siteMetadata.title: Dmitry Vinnik
siteMetadata.description: Dmitry Vinnik is an engineering manager specializing in AI/ML. He is currently working at Meta, where he leads a team of engineers developing cutting-edge solutions. With a decade of experience in the tech industry, Dmitry is recognized for his expertise in developer relations, dev tools, programming languages, and open source technologies. He is a regular speaker at conferences and meetups on various topics related to software development, open source, and engineering leadership.
siteMetadata.author: Dmitry Vinnik
